name: Antique Rifle

The most basic type of weapon， with its fast reloading being its sole advantage.

name: Emperor's Majesty
description:
This rifle was designed and constructed by the Royal Design Bureau under the order of the Emperor and was praised as the key for the empire to win the war. Due to insufficient production capacity， it can only be equipped to the Royal Guard.
High armor penetration rate， ignores shields， deals DMG twice， and explodes 0.1s after hitting.
Movement speed: <D1>%， Rotational speed: <D2>%

name: Gauss sniper rifle
description:
The ultimate form of kinetic weapons that accelerates the projectile to break through 23 Mach through magnetic force， crushing all conventional materials into powder. Almost no conventional material can withstand its destructive force.
Movement speed: <D1>%; Rotational speed: <D2>%

name: Magnetic railgun

name: Lava spray

name: Electromagnetic Triple-Barreled Cannon
description:
This is a high-tech weapon smuggled from other countries. It can be classified as a light electromagnetic cannon， which is actually a kinetic weapon with 3 barrels， and the shooting method is high-precision 3-round burst. It is expensive and has powerful weapon performance. However， it's too sophisticated to maintain and has high maintenance costs and wear rate. Still， it is a powerful weapon. 
Movement speed: <D1>%， Rotational speed: <D2>%.

name: Purgatory ray
description:

An energy storage mechanism has been added， which can be used to store energy by long pressing and firing. It can emits powerful particle beams that can penetrate the shield， consuming 2 bullets each time.
Movement speed: <D1>%; Rotational speed: <D2>%

name: Glaring Cannon ZM12A1+I54
description:
A product of combining the ultimate models of ray weapons and electric arc weapons.
It can fire an astonishingly high-energy particle stream. The target hit by the particle stream will be destroyed by sky-burning arcs， leaving nothing but flames.
It's extremely heavy.
Movement speed: <D1>%， Rotational speed: <D2>%.
